calculations.name: Bear Flattener Large Shock
calculations.tableau_expression:
// Created by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau on 10/17/2017

if [Risk Date # of Days]< 750 then 10   //Short End + 10bps
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]> 10950 then 5  // Long End + 5bps
        else 
        10*(1-([Risk Date # of Days]-750) / (10950-750)) + 5*([Risk Date # of Days]-750)/(10950-750)

        END
    END
